Reviews.Title: Not high resolution
Reviews.Author: ag
Reviews.Content: This camera is 420tvl.  Daylight picture is adequate.  At night picture is grainy even in black & white.  IR's do as advertised and work well. In retrospect I wouldn't buy this camera again. Look for 540tvl or better for the same or better price.

ProductInfo.Features:
Quick and easy to install. Affordable security surveillance. Easily Connects to TV, VCR DVR for Viewing or Recording
CCD Image sensor. Build in f3.7mm cone pinhole lens
420 TVL horizontal resolution. NTSC Standard
Weatherproof housing ensures reliable operation in outdoor applications
Package included: 4 of Color CCD Cameras, 4 x adjustable swivel mounts and 4 of 12V DC 500mA power supplies
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Pack of Outdoor Color CCD CCTV Pinhole Hidden Covert Bullet Security Cameras 3.7mm Lens Weatherproof for DVR Home Surveillance System with Bonus Power Supplies WK6
